Friendly Chat Welcome! Sign Out Access to account information is required to sign in. Invite Please join me for a friendly chat Call to action Friendly Chat Invite Sign In Sign Up Fresh Config Cause Crash ca-app-pub-3940256099942544/6300978111 Map
//permission Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map. This sample requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Google Maps API Demos\'. Location permission is required for this demo.
